review.title: “Quite good, better internal processes would benefit a lot.”
review.pros: Pros – Very good equipment - hardware, kind atmosphere, educated, responsible and professional staff, interesting projects, great oportunities of improving knowledge and experience.
review.cons: Cons – Poor pay, clients have great influence on work, but can't properly describe their needs and they often change them, too much pressure compare to too less control over results.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Provide better internal projects, fulfill promises, rethink costs of projects in terms of people and hours to provide reasonable timeline.
